name: Talewind
description: Talewind is a whimsical platformer where you play as a young boy that is trying to save his village, but dont let its looks fool you, it will challenge even the most experienced platformer veterans. trailer music: bensound.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Core i3-530 2.93 GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 2GB of memory or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Review based on the first 3 acts and the gameplay shown.  Very classic styled platformer similar to Mario and Sonic with its own mechanics of wind travel involved. The gameplay each act is to complete the levels fast and collect the required feathers.  At the end of Act 3 there is a boss which changes the gameplay up at just the right time to make me want to play more. Further review is going to come once I complete the game but so far I'm impressed with what is shown.  Me playing the first 3 acts for those interested:         YouTube™ Video:

I made a review and introduction view of Talewind, and it includes a giveaway of the game ending @ 13th of October 2016.  Go check it out here:         YouTube™ Video:  Talewind - New Indie Platformer! Review + Giveaway
